code: /**  * Set the destination index.  */ public ReindexRequestBuilder destination(String index) {     destination.setIndex(index).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Set the destination index and type.  */
code: /**  * Set the destination index and type.  */ public ReindexRequestBuilder destination(String index, String type) {     destination.setIndex(index).setType(type).     return this. }

comment: /**  * Setup reindexing from a remote cluster.  */
code: /**  * Setup reindexing from a remote cluster.  */ public ReindexRequestBuilder setRemoteInfo(RemoteInfo remoteInfo) {     request().setRemoteInfo(remoteInfo).     return this. }
